textos_fuente.text: Board & Staff – U.S. Federation of Worker Cooperatives Skip to content HOME MEMBERSHIP Benefits of Membership Our members Join the USFWC Worker Benefits Program Member News Pay Dues Member Engagement Form PROGRAMS Member Councils Peer Networks Public Policy & Advocacy Worker Benefits Co-op Clinic (Technical Assistance & Training) Guilded: the Freelancer’s Co-op Initiative Worker Co-op Awards Speaker’s Bureau Worker Co-op Conference Consulting NEWS News and Updates Press About Worker Co-ops Sign Up for Updates RESOURCES Learn more about co-ops Find a Worker Co-op Want to start a worker co-op? Begin here. Technical Assistance (Co-op Clinic) Immigrant Support Resource Hub Democracy at Work Institute Service Provider Directory Networking: Join our worker co-op communications platforms #ShopCoop Co-op Clinic Mini Guides ABOUT JOBS EVENTS Para español, haga clic aquí Menu Search for: USFWC Board and Staff The mission and vision of the USFWC is stewarded by our staff and board. The board is made up of elected at-large directors that reflect the membership and mission of the USFWC. Jump to Staff USFWC Board of Directors As of June 2023, all board seats are at-large. Learn more here . Kimberly Britt ChiFresh Kitchen . First elected 2022, reelected 2024 Mavery Davis, Treasurer New Economy Works West Virginia , The Seed Commons Network , The Ajani Group Cooperative A ppointed 2022, elected 2023 Denise Hernandez Cooperative Homecare Associates . First elected 2021, reelected 2023 Ricardo Nuñez, Vice-President Sustainable Economies Law Center . First elected 2016, reelected 2023. Co-chair for the Racial Economic Justice Council Dominique Pearson L.A. Co-op Lab Appointed 2022, reelected 2024 Alan Luis Ramirez PODER Emma . Elected 2023 Adrian Roman, Secretary Colmenar Consulting LLC, Dorchester Art Project . Elected 2024 Evelyn Torres, Vice-Treasurer Radiate Consulting NYC . Elected 2024 Ellen Vera, President Co-op Cincy . Elected 2023 Esteban Kelly - esteban [at] usworker [dot] coop Executive Director Visit Our Past Board Members Page Here USFWC Staff Kate Barut - kate [at] usworker [dot] coop Membership Manager Michael Brennan - michael [at] usworker [dot] coop Projects Coordinator Tehmina Brohi - tehmina [at] usworker [dot] coop Membership Director Morgan Crawford - morgan [at] usworker [dot] coop Systems Manager Maureen Darras - maureen [at] usworker [dot] coop Co-op Clinic Training Manager Matt Feinstein - matt [at] usworker [dot] coop Co-op Clinic Technical Assistance Manager Jamie Gill - jamie [at] usworker [dot] coop Administrative Manager Annette Griffin - annette [at] usworker [dot] coop Bookkeeper, contractor Esteban Kelly - esteban [at] usworker [dot] coop Executive Director Elizabeth Lopez - elizabeth [at] usworker [dot] coop Operations Manager Savanna Lyons - savanna[at] usworker [dot] coop Senior Managing Director Mo Manklang - mo [at] usworker [dot] coop Senior Director of Government Relations Chloe Montañez Executive Assistant, contractor Maria Myotte - maria [at] usworker [dot] coop Development Director Raquel Victoria Navarro - raquel [at] usworker [dot] coop Communications Coordinator Camila Tapia-Guilliams - camila [at] usworker [dot] coop Training and Education Coordinator Maddie Taterka - maddie[at] usworker [dot] coop Worker Benefits Manager eli tizcareño - eli [at] usworker [dot] coop Director of Education and Training John-Michael Torres - johnmichael [at] usworker [dot] coop Communications Director Sasha Warner-Berry - sasha [at] usworker [dot] coop Network Organizing Manager BECOME A SUSTAINER Give monthly or make a one-time donation - every dollar goes to helping the worker co-op movement in the U.S. Give Today Latest News Advocacy Alert: Rural Co-op Development Grant Notice of Funding Opportunity Released September 5, 2025 Five questions with “Worker Co-ops of the World Unite!” poster artist Camila Tapia September 4, 2025 Call to Action: Tell Congress that Rural Co-op Development Funds are vital! Her marine ecology background includes reef resilience and coral community ecology. Email: InvertColl@myfwc.com Corinne Fuchs Marine Invertebrate Collection Manager Corinne Fuchs joined the FWRI as Marine Invertebrate Collection Manager in 2019. Her marine ecology background includes reef resilience and coral community ecology. Email: InvertColl@myfwc.com Eric Post Ichthyology Collection Manager Eric started as ichthyology collection manager in September, 2016. He graduated Oregon State University with a degree in Fish and Wildlife Science. His interests are in fish taxonomy, systematics, and phylogenetics and in building and maintaining specimen collections. Email: FishColl@myfwc.com Janessa Fletcher SEAMAP Collection Manager Janessa has been at FWRI since 2002 and was appointed as a collection manager in 2016. Her research background is in the taxonomy and ecology of echinoderms, molluscs, and fish.
